WorkItem.Description:
I have tried several things to get the attached error to go away. The non-descript error message didn't help - but I found out, that the error goes away, when I don't put the program on a network mounted folder. Same problem applies, if the XML-Characterfiles are stored on the net. 
Â 
Please add some more descript error message so noone else gets the same problem.
WorkItem.Summary: Rawr doesn't work from a network drive

Comments.Message: ummm... dont run it that way?

Well, that message means that there's an error of some sort outside of Rawr's control; something system level. I know some people who run Rawr off network drives, USB drives, etc, works fine. So there's likely something wrong on your side, but I'm not sure what would cause that.
